mapper.select: update RULE_engine set rule_engine_id = #{rule_engine_id},rule_base_type = #{rule_base_type},city_id = #{city_id},company_id = #{company_id},rule_base_name = #{rule_base_name},rule_base_content = #{rule_base_content},rule_base_postil = #{rule_base_postil},status = #{status},last_updated = #{last_updated},metadata_item = #{metadata_item} where id = #{id}
